PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-09152019-06-22,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  GAC
ActUnited Nations Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Regulations Implementing the United Nations Resolution on Yemen
PrecisRegulations Amending the REGULATIONS IMPLEMENTING THE UNITED NATIONS RESOLUTION ON YEMEN in order to (1) further respond to the ongoing political crisis and conflict in Yemen; (2) fulfill Canada's international legal obligation to implement the binding decisions of the Security Council set out in Resolution 2216 (2015); and (3) address miscellaneous amendments raised by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0250 Publication Date: 2019-07-10
AttachmentsAttachment
